item.title: Book Club: Working Effectively With Legacy Code - Chapter 9 (Michael Feathers)
item.description: In our latest technical book club we discussed chapter 9 - ‘I Can’t Get This Class Into A Test Harness’ - of Michael Feather’s ‘Working Effectively With Legacy Code’. This chapter goes through various problems that we might have getting a class under test and then suggests different techniques to get around those problems. These are some of my thoughts and our discussion of the chapter: While I think this is a useful strategy it’s useful to keep in mind that the need to do this is often an indication that the class is doing too much and we probably need to look at breaking that class out into two smaller ones.
